monster.name: Chupacabra
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
text: While in sunlight, the chupacabra has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Drain Blood
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature that is prone, incapacitated, or restrained. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the chupacabra regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

reaction.name: Pin
text: If a creature within 5 feet of the chupacabra stands up, the chupacabra can use its reaction to make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The deathspitter makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage.

action.name: Spit Poison
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. Hit: The target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, a creature that fails its saving throw is blinded until the end of the deathspitter's next turn.
